#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    int t,x;
    cin>>t;
    
    for(x=1;x<=t;x++)
    {
       char s[100000],c;
      cin>>s;
       int temp,i,k;
       k=0;
       for(k=0;k<strlen(s);)
       {
                         if(s[k]=='1')
                     printf("%c",100+(s[k+1]-48)*10+(s[k+2]-48)),k+=3;
          else
                printf("%c",(s[k]-48)*10+(s[k+1]-48)),k+=2;
          
       }
          cout<<endl;}
          }
